title: Justicar Syndra
body: Ive only noticed it on the Justicar skin but when backing she like starts her idle animation before the back animation and into mid game her movement animation is switched to the movement animation of her atlantean skin.

replies.body:
Hiya LightArcs  -

Thanks for the report! We made some minor adjustments to Syndra last patch visually, and it looks like her run got a bit messed up. D: We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
